original_text: As for the appearance of the wheels and their construction: their appearance was like the gleaming of beryl. And the four had the same likeness, their appearance and construction being as it were a wheel within a wheel.
korean_text: 그 바퀴의 모양과 그 구조는 황옥 같이 보이는데 그 넷은 똑같은 모양을 가지고 있으며 그들의 모양과 구조는 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: As for the appearance of the wheels
their appearance was like the gleaming of beryl.
And the four had the same likeness,
their appearance and construction being as it were a wheel within a wheel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 모양과 구조는 마치 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것과 같았다.
